name: SPACEWIZARD: A Wizard in Space
description:
In SPACEWIZARD: A Wizard in Space you are a mage sent through time and caught in an invasion of the planet earth. Using your magical abilities over lightning and flame you must fend off as many of these evil invaders as you can.

With 7 unique enemy types and an arsenal of 4 spells there are endless waves of alien ships and a boss on level 16 for you to destroy!


Made in 13 days for Gamedev.js Jam 2020

Thanks for playing  <3
